page.title: 10CHEVINGTON SCHOOL 1984/5
page.content: Sept.18 Talk by local Farmer about his childhood on a farm Oct. 30 Talk by a lady about life in service as a Tweeny to Cook (Both school topic life past 100 yrs.) Nov. 26 Visit to Rural Life Museum Dec. 7 Carol Service Dec. 11/13 Performances of Christmas plays and music to village Feb. 14 Assembly with parents Mar. 20 Visit to Science Fair at Horringer Court Middle School Mar. 21 Assembly with parents May 17 14 children took part in Folk Dance Festival at Felixstowe June 18 Visit to Colne Valley Railway June 25 An inter-school Sports Day June 27 Took part in Music Festival July 2 Music performed to Over 60's July 6 Sports Day and P.T.A. Fete July 19 End of term Concert & Assembly to which parents were invited
